title: Canada’s New National Digital Research Infrastructure Organization Launches, Names Inaugural Board
description: Canadian Journal of Education, Mar 12, 2020 The organization was established to create "a way to help academic researchers access, manage and protect vast amounts of research data." It is a membership-based organization, "with founding members comprising more…
